main.name: Shehreyar Khan
main.occupation: Full Stack Developer | UI / UX Designer
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe react
main.bio: Hi there! I'm a Full Stack developer coding and dreaming on (React Js, Express Js, Node Js etc) Experienced with all stages of the development cycle for dynamic web projects and native applications. Well-versed in numerous programming languages including HTML5, PHP OOP, JavaScript (ES6, ES7, ES8), CSS, CSS3, CSS4, Bootstrap, Tailwind, MySQL and NonSQL (Firebase, MongoDB) Strong background in project management and customers relation. I can help with the design and development of software. Testing and debugging software to keep it optimized.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me so that we can discuss your upcoming project!

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sherry is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge helped me a lot it really meant a lot to me... I would definitely recommend
Coding with Sherry has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
